00078 def MakePie(setToolAction):
00079 
00080     ########################################################################
00081     # Make pie menus.
00082 
00083 
00084     # top
00085     topPie = piemenu.PieMenu(
00086         header="Micropolis Menu",
00087         fixedRadius=50,
00088         neutralDescription="Select an option.")
00089 
00090     # top/tool
00091     toolPie = piemenu.PieMenu(
00092         header="Micropolis Tools",
00093         fixedRadius=50,
00094         neutralDescription="Select a Micropolis editing tool,\nor the zone or build submenu.")
00095 
00096     # top/tool/zone
00097     zonePie = piemenu.PieMenu(
00098         header="Zone",
00099         fixedRadius=50,
00100         neutralDescription="Select a zoning tool.")
00101 
00102     # top/zone/build
00103     buildPie = piemenu.PieMenu(
00104         header="Build",
00105         fixedRadius=50,
00106         neutralDescription="Select a building tool.")
00107 
00108     # top/control
00109     controlPie = piemenu.PieMenu(
00110         header="Control",
00111         fixedRadius=50,
00112         neutralDescription="Select a control.")
00113 
00114     # top/foo
00115     fooPie = piemenu.PieMenu(
00116         header="Foo",
00117         fixedRadius=50,
00118         neutralDescription="Select a foo.")
00119 
00120     # top/view
00121     viewPie = piemenu.PieMenu(
00122         header="View",
00123         fixedRadius=50,
00124         neutralDescription="Select a view option.")
00125 
00126 
00127     ########################################################################
00128     # Populate pie menus.
00129 
00130 
00131     for params in (
00132 
00133         {
00134             'pie': toolPie,
00135             'label': 'Zone...',
00136             'description': "Submenu of zoning tools.",
00137             'subPie': zonePie,
00138         },
00139 
00140         {
00141             'pie': zonePie,
00142             'description': 'Commercial\nzoning tool.',
00143             'loliteFillColor': None,
00144             'loliteStrokeColor': None,
00145             'icon': 'images/micropolisEngine/iccom.png',
00146             'iconHilite': 'images/micropolisEngine/iccomhi.png',
00147             'action': lambda item: setToolAction('Commercial'),
00148         },
00149 
00150         {
00151             'pie': zonePie,
00152             'description': 'Industrial\nzoning tool.',
00153             'loliteFillColor': None,
00154             'loliteStrokeColor': None,
00155             'icon': 'images/micropolisEngine/icind.png',
00156             'iconHilite': 'images/micropolisEngine/icindhi.png',
00157             'action': lambda item: setToolAction('Industrial'),
00158         },
00159 
00160         {
00161             'pie': zonePie,
00162             'description': 'Police station\nzoning tool.',
00163             'loliteFillColor': None,

00165             'icon': 'images/micropolisEngine/icpol.png',

00168         },

00378 def NewMakePie(setToolAction):
00379 
00380     ########################################################################
00381     # Make pie menus.
00382 
00383 
00384     toolPie = piemenu.PieMenu(
00385         header="Micropolis Tools",
00386         fixedRadius=25,
00387         ringRadius=70,
00388         maxPieItems=(8, 8, 16,),
00389         neutralDescription="Select a Micropolis editing tool,\nor the zone or build submenu.")
00390 
00391 
00392     ########################################################################
00393     # Populate pie menus.
00394 
00395 
00396     for params in (
00397 
00398         # Inner Ring
00399 
00400         { # North
00401             'pie': toolPie,
00402             'description': 'Commercial\nzoning tool.',
00403             'loliteFillColor': None,
00404             'loliteStrokeColor': None,
00405             'icon': 'images/micropolisEngine/iccom.png',
00406             'iconHilite': 'images/micropolisEngine/iccomhi.png',
00407             'action': lambda item: setToolAction('Commercial'),
00408         },
00409 
00410         { # NorthEast
00411             'pie': toolPie,
00412             'description': 'Industrial\nzoning tool.',
00413             'loliteFillColor': None,
00414             'loliteStrokeColor': None,
00415             'icon': 'images/micropolisEngine/icind.png',
00416             'iconHilite': 'images/micropolisEngine/icindhi.png',
00417             'action': lambda item: setToolAction('Industrial'),
00418         },
00419 
00420         { # East
00421             'pie': toolPie,
00422             'description': 'Road editing tool.',
00423             'loliteFillColor': None,
00424             'loliteStrokeColor': None,
00425             'icon': 'images/micropolisEngine/icroad.png',
00426             'iconHilite': 'images/micropolisEngine/icroadhi.png',
00427             'action': lambda item: setToolAction('Road'),
00428         },
00429

00433             'loliteFillColor': None,

00573 ########################################################################
00574 
00575 
00576 def main():
00577 
00578     ########################################################################
00579     # Make Window and PieMenuTarget.
00580 
00581 
00582     win = gtk.Window()
00583     win.set_title("Micropolis Pie Menus, by Don Hopkins")
00584 
00585     target = piemenu.PieMenuTarget(label="Micropolis Pie Menus")
00586 
00587     win.add(target)
00588 
00589     def setToolAction(toolName):
00590         print "setToolAction", toolName
00591 
00592     pie = MakePie(setToolAction)
00593     target.setPie(pie)
00594 
00595     win.resize(300, 300)
00596 
00597     win.show_all()
00598 
00599     gtk.main()
00600 
00601 
00602 ########################################################################
00603 
00604 
00605 if __name__ == '__main__':
00606     main()
00607
